item.description: If you want to use Twitter’s Twemoji across your website, enable it in your config.toml [params] enableTwemoji = true This will not only give your website unified emojis across all platforms. It will also give you the latest Unicode 13 emoji set, such as ðŸ§‹ðŸ«•ðŸ›»ðŸª—ðŸªž. item.title: Theme Demo
item.description: Style Demo h1 Heading h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text Deleted text This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$ Heading Another heading text text text text text text Block quotes are written like so.

I am a Junior Software Engineer mostly involved in Web Development. I am currently working for ServisBOT, where I am part of the Bot-Building/Customer Sucess team. In my day to day Bot Building I get to play aroud with cool technologies like: Google DialogFlow Amazon Lex Amazon Rekognition Twilio I am a graduate of the Institute of Technology, Carlow where I studied Software Development, I have also studied Computer Science at Griffith College, Dublin and recently I completed a level 8 certificate in Data Protection.
Feel free to contact me on Twitter, LinkedIn or email.
